MS MCQs

    Instrument a cloud-native ASP.NET Core microservice

    »

    1. Which of the following statements is NOT true about logging and monitoring?

      Diagnostics logging is a key factor for troubleshooting issues in production.

      The purpose of app monitoring is to track key business performance indicators.

      A correlation ID establishes a link between two or more contexts or apps.

      Structured logging allows you to get more information from your log traces than plain-text logging.


    2. Which of the following statements is NOT true for Application Insights?

      One Application Insights resource (instrumentation key) must be created per service.

      Application Map can be used to investigate failures and performance issues across services and dependencies.

      Application Insights provides built-in correlation and dependency tracking.

      Application Insights is enabled by default for all ASP.NET Core apps running on AKS.


    3. Which of the following statements is NOT true about Azure Monitor for Containers?

      Azure Monitor for Containers gives you infrastructure-oriented metrics.

      A Prometheus server must be installed to monitor Prometheus endpoint metrics in AKS.

      Using a Kusto query, you can retrieve the Prometheus performance metric data from the Azure portal.

      Azure Monitor for Containers can scrape metrics from Prometheus-based metrics endpoints.
